title: Luxury 1 bed, heat, hot water and 1 pkg included.
posting_body: ['Beautiful 1 bed, 1 bath in Luxury Building.', 'Includes heat/hot water and 1 parking space.', 'Dishwasher/disposal, wall to wall carpet,', 'laundry in the building.', 'Fully equipped fitness center, locker rooms with saunas,', 'and heated pool.', 'Available 9/1, no pets or smoking allowed.', 'Good credit and employment required.', 'Set up your viewing now.', 'Call 617-974-3019.', 'Faster connection if you call me.', 'There is a real estate fee of $2,700.', 'if you rent this unit.', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA', '617-974-3019', 'Leave me your email address for photos.', 'Please reference: Luxury 1 bed Harvard Sq.', 'in your text or message Thank you']
